TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ResourceResponseBase extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.Azure.Documents.Client.IResourceResponseBase
Public MustInherit Class ResourceResponseBase Implements IResourceResponseBase

Docs.summary: Represents the non-resource specific service response headers returned by any request in the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Constructor exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ActivityId As String
public: property System::String ^ ActivityId { System::String ^ get(); };
public: property Platform::String ^ ActivityId { Platform::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the activity ID for the request from the Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.value: The activity ID for the request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CollectionQuota As Long
public: property long CollectionQuota { long get(); };
public: property long long CollectionQuota { long long get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the maximum quota for collection resources within an account from the Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.value: The maximum quota for the account.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CollectionSizeQuota As Long
public: property long CollectionSizeQuota { long get(); };
public: property long long CollectionSizeQuota { long long get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the maximum size of a collection in kilobytes from the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CollectionSizeUsage As Long
public: property long CollectionSizeUsage { long get(); };
public: property long long CollectionSizeUsage { long long get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the current size of a collection in kilobytes from the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CollectionUsage As Long
public: property long CollectionUsage { long get(); };
public: property long long CollectionUsage { long long get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the current number of collection resources within the account from the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentLocation As String
public: property System::String ^ ContentLocation { System::String ^ get(); };
public: property Platform::String ^ ContentLocation { Platform::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: The content parent location, for example, dbs/foo/colls/bar in the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentResourceQuotaUsage As String
public: property System::String ^ CurrentResourceQuotaUsage { System::String ^ get(); };
public: property Platform::String ^ CurrentResourceQuotaUsage { Platform::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the current size of this entity from the Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.value: The current size for this entity. Measured in kilobytes for document resources and in counts for other resources.

public: property long long DatabaseQuota { long long get(); };

public: property long DatabaseUsage { long get(); };
public: property long long DatabaseUsage { long long get(); };

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DocumentQuota As Long
public: property long DocumentQuota { long get(); };
public: property long long DocumentQuota { long long get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the maximum size of a documents within a collection in kilobytes from the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DocumentUsage As Long
public: property long DocumentUsage { long get(); };
public: property long long DocumentUsage { long long get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the current size of documents within a collection in kilobytes from the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IndexTransformationProgress As Long
public: property long IndexTransformationProgress { long get(); };
public: property long long IndexTransformationProgress { long long get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the progress of an index transformation, if one is underway from the Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.value: An integer from 0 to 100 representing percentage completion of the index transformation process. Returns -1 if the index transformation progress header could not be found.
Docs.remarks: An index will be rebuilt when the IndexPolicy of a collection is updated.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsRUPerMinuteUsed As Boolean
public: property bool IsRUPerMinuteUsed { bool get(); };
public: property bool IsRUPerMinuteUsed { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the flag associated with the response from the Azure Cosmos DB service whether this request is served from Request Units(RUs)/minute capacity or not.
Docs.value: True if this request is served from RUs/minute capacity. Otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LazyIndexingProgress As Long
public: property long LazyIndexingProgress { long get(); };
public: property long long LazyIndexingProgress { long long get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the progress of lazy indexing from the Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.value: An integer from 0 to 100 representing percentage completion of the lazy indexing process. Returns -1 if the lazy indexing progress header could not be found.
Docs.remarks: Lazy indexing progress only applies to the collection with indexing mode Lazy.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MaxResourceQuota As String
public: property System::String ^ MaxResourceQuota { System::String ^ get(); };
public: property Platform::String ^ MaxResourceQuota { Platform::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the maximum size limit for this entity from the Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.value: The maximum size limit for this entity. Measured in kilobytes for document resources and in counts for other resources.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RequestCharge As Double

Docs.summary: Gets the request charge for this request from the Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.value: The request charge measured in reqest units.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RequestDiagnosticsString As String
public: property System::String ^ RequestDiagnosticsString { System::String ^ get(); };
public: property Platform::String ^ RequestDiagnosticsString { Platform::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the diagnostics information for the current request to Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.remarks: This field is only valid when the request uses direct connectivity.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RequestLatency As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan RequestLatency { TimeSpan get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the end-to-end request latency for the current request to Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.remarks: This field is only valid when the request uses direct connectivity.

Docs.summary: Gets the response headers from the Azure Cosmos DB service.

public: property System::String ^ SessionToken { System::String ^ get(); };
